body.name: Yaheetech Full Upholstered Platform Bed Frame, Mattress Foundation with Height Adjustable Tufted Headboard, Wooden Slat Support, No Box Spring Needed, Non-Slip, Easy Assembly, Navy Blue-Full
deliveryMessages: $49.99 delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 56 mins.
features: ✔【Height-Adjustable Upholstered Headboard】The height-adjustable panel headboard for full bed frame ranges from 113 cm/ 44.5" to 123 cm/48.5", you can adapt it to the optimal height for your needs. Just apply mattress and sheet, you'll be ready for read, relax or sweet dream in total comfort. (No Box Spring Needed)

✔【Square Tufted & High-Resilience Foam】 Foam-filled is not accessible to sag. The resilience brought by foam filling fits the body, creating a comfortable and private sleeping space. With its elegant square tufted look, this full size upholstered bed with headboard is easy to pair with all sorts of different decor.

✔【Solid Construction & EVA Foam】Supported by a metal frame, 8 strong legs,12 solid wood support slats, this full size bed frame with headboard ensures improved stability and a high weight capacity of 360kg/794lb. Extra EVA foam design on metal frame ensures no shaky, squeaky and noise.
✔【6.3 Inch Underbed Space】16cm/6.3" ground clearance for future dust cleaning. Cleaning robots can pass through freely, making cleaning this full upholstered platform bed a breeze for you.

✔【No Box Spring Needed】Require no bulky box spring or any other extra foundation. After assembling the upholstered bed frame with adjustable headboard, just put your latex, foam or spring mattress on the wooden slats, and everything is all set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars That packaging, tho…!
reviews.reviewText: I can’t say enough good things about this headboard. Looks great, feels great, a breeze to assemble (compared to other assembly-required furniture)…But there’s something I haven’t seen any reviews mention: the packaging. This included foam and styrofoam blocks to help keep everything secure. And the styrofoam was sealed in plastic to prevent that obnoxious flaking you always get with “loose” styrofoam blocks. You’re forever vacuuming and picking those little white balls off everything. But not with this bed.I know it seems melodramatic to spend more characters on this than the bed itself, but it really does speak to the priorities of this manufacturer. It’s not a chintzy brand that will pack the styrofoam packing in its own protective packaging. And yet this bed was more than affordable.Back to the bed. It feels very sturdy, and although the headboard is light and not a solid hunk of wood, it doesn’t feel “cheap” like more lackluster reviews have suggested.I love that the headboard’s height is adjustable, meaning that while I’m still using my thinner 8” mattress, I can use the higher option for the headboard and throw my box springs under my mattress. In a year or so when I upgrade my mattress to a thicker 10-12” masterpiece, I’ll remove the box springs and lower the headboard.My roommate and I put this together in about 20 minutes. If I’d been at it alone, it would’ve taken us me about an hour (don’t judge).Impressive bed, impressive packaging, impressive price. Don’t hesitate, just buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The instructions are very easy to follow, it is solid in terms of structure and it’s great for a student who doesn’t want to spend a lot of money. The packing too is great. A lot of foam to protect the parts. Again as I said the bed frame is pretty solid, and does not shake. And the color is exactly as sold. Overall pleased with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to understand instructions, very sturdy frame and stylish for the price. I love the Navy blue color and it was just as advertised. Nice packaging and no loose styrofoam flying all over the place as the foam was wrapped in a plastic covering. This bed did not have a weird chemical smell.Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just what we had hoped for. Easy to assemble. Directions were very clear and concise. Packaging was great. Everything was individually wrapped in plastic. Recommends two, but I was able to assemble by myself. Great value for the money. Love the color. Would buy from this company again in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The ordering process and delivery was on time and handled carefully. The bed itself was perfect for my college Grandson. He loves it was easy to assemble and well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together, looks great!
reviews.reviewText: Had issues with FedEx delivering it to the wrong place , but then got it the next day. Not the merchants fault, just FedEx being garbage as usual.The bed frame is really easy to put together and easy to read instructions and all the parts were present (including some extra). I got the beige one and highly recommend putting it together with the plastic on and tearing it off, especially if you have a dog around that sheds.Overall, would recommend for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Omg I purchased three of them for my grandson's room I love the way it was easy to put together and affordable I recommend this to anyone who is on a budget with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. Beautiful and sturdy. Exactly as advertised.
Por protección para mí hijo que padece de epilepsia y así ya no se lastima sus manos y cabeza, gracias
Calidad precio está muy caro, esta bonito pero si esta excesivamente caro para lo que es hay más baratos y misma calidad, si no baja el precio si les recomiendo que busquen otro más económico.
